ASIA Nominal China GDP? Not prettyA look at the day ahead in Asian markets. Wed, 17 Jan 2024 21:55:24 GMT CBPLSIETMBKIDCRQATNOKQPCYQ https://www.reuters.com/markets/asia/global-markets-view-asia-graphic-2024-01-17/Jamie McGeever市场亚洲市场
Dalian Pro latest Chinese Super League club to close due to 'historical debts'Chinese Super League club Dalian Pro has announced its dissolution with immediate effect after failing to be granted a licence for the upcoming season. Wed, 17 Jan 2024 21:21:41 GMT JSWZVUUZOBNZZA2CFQVFGBOEOU https://www.reuters.com/sports/soccer/dalian-pro-latest-chinese-super-league-club-close-due-historical-debts-2024-01-17/Michael Church运动的足球
Exclusive: ECB sounds out lenders on exposure to Spanish drugmaker Grifols - sourcesThe European Central Bank has asked some lenders to detail their exposure to Spain's Grifols and its related entities, after the drugmaker was last week accused of manipulating its financial accounts by a short-seller, sources said. Wed, 17 Jan 2024 18:14:24 GMT BZ4PRQUZNZM2XL3JAK3VRURTSY https://www.reuters.com/business/healthcare-pharmaceuticals/ecb-sounds-out-lenders-exposure-spanish-drugmaker-grifols-sources-2024-01-17/Jesús Aguado商业医疗保健与制药
German hard coal importers turn to US and AustraliaGerman importers of coal for power generation, heating and steelmaking have found new suppliers in the United States and Australia, enabling them to end their reliance on Russia, industry body VDKi said on Wednesday. Wed, 17 Jan 2024 17:16:08 GMT FTG67OEOABIPRDDLI7MPOG6WAE https://www.reuters.com/business/energy/german-hard-coal-importers-turn-us-australia-2024-01-17/Reuters商业活力
Serbia wants talks with Rio Tinto over Jadar lithium projectSerbia wants to hold further talks with Anglo-Australian miner Rio Tinto , about its lithium project in the country, President Aleksandar Vucic said on Wednesday, adding that there should also be more public discussion over whether it should go ahead. Wed, 17 Jan 2024 17:04:33 GMT OFR4N7WGQZPMFOPKOH667WF7EI https://www.reuters.com/markets/commodities/serbia-wants-talks-with-rio-tinto-over-jadar-lithium-project-2024-01-17/Reuters商业达沃斯
Red Sea attacks unlikely to hit French cereals exports to Asia for now - FranceAgriMerAttacks on ships in the Red Sea are unlikely for now to affect exports of French cereals to Asia, notably China which is a key market for France, since they are targeted at ships going towards Israel, farm office FranceAgriMer on Wednesday. Wed, 17 Jan 2024 15:51:21 GMT IQPYILXEDRIXPI77U47X7I7I34 https://www.reuters.com/markets/commodities/red-sea-attacks-unlikely-hit-french-cereals-exports-asia-now-franceagrimer-2024-01-17/Reuters市场商品
